Build ID: I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
Using the driver versions listed under "More Information".
1. Created an Endpoint Project
2. Created an Endpoint Type with Identity, ManageabilityCharacteristics, MEX, and Resource Properties capabilities
3. Generated Java Code on the modeled endpoint
4. Created a debug server for Tomcat in the server view
5. Added the generated web app to the server
6. Started the Tomcat server
7. The following exception is thrown:

This msut be added to the list of files being added specified in the extension for axis2

Created an attachment (id=64738)
Removes log4j.jar from list of jars required from axis2 install and changes commons-logging.properties to do simple logging that does not need log4j
